name: Blade of Fire
description:
A challenging 2D hack slash game.

Features:

- A variety of unique enemies, which have different designs and will attack in different ways

- 4 unique boss fights

- 2 distinct level backgrounds, with variations on higher levels

- A fast/tense soundtrack, with 2 variations based on the level area.

- PS4 controller support(press any button on controller to activate it)

Controls:

Arrow keys(Controller: Dpad/left analog) = Move

S(Controller: X) = Jump

W(Controller: Triangle) = Normal attack

- Hitbox nullifies projectiles

D(Controller: O) = Heavenly Slash

- Gap closer, invincible while moving

- Backwards hitbox on first phase

- Hitbox nullifies projectiles

- Can only be used while standing

A(Controller: Square) = Dodge

- Can only be used while standing

- Moves backwards, can pass through enemies

Offering this game for free, however donations will be much appreciated as I continue working on more games :)
